name: deviantART: tiny birthdays (rotane)
description: Based on Kath602's idea ( http://fav.me/d3exela ) to make the Birthday notification in deviantART's message centre smaller.

user.name: rotane
user.about: I like to write userstyles. Some of them i upload here, the majority of which are for deviantART.com
